description.en: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: O Senhor Grizz segue seu mestre e recolhe os itens caídos.
description.cns: 跟随主人并拾取周围物品。
description.de: Dieser süße Teddy folgt seinem Besitzer und hebt Gegenstände für ihn auf.
description.fi: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: Un ourson adorable qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les monstres.
description.id: Mister Grizz yang setia mengikuti tuannya berkeliling dan mengambil barang-barang drop.
description.it: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: 周囲のアイテムを収集してくれます。
description.kr: 귀여운 테디베어가 따라다니며 주변의 아이템을 자동 습득 합니다.
description.nl: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.sp: Mister Grizz sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Mister Grizz follows his master around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: Mister Grizzติดตามเจ้านายของเขาไปรอบๆ และหยิบไอเทมที่ดรอป
description.tw: 可愛泰迪熊跟著它的主人四處走走，撿起掉落的道具。
description.vi: Mister Grizz đi theo chủ nhân của mình và nhặt các vật phẩm đánh rơi.
